评论详情: Feels so good on. The color is very vibrant. Good quality for the money. Very stretchy with a matte color. Stops right at my bellybutton.  Get a size bigger if you don't want that snug fit.

I have this shirt in three colors now. the material is amazing, so smooth, tight and form fitting but comfortable. wearing size small. I did have to size down in the white to a xs though, the fabric was a bit loose around my waist. i’m a 32DDD, waist 24 in.
I got a long sleeve shirt from this brand and love it so I thought to order this shirt and I think it was a different brand and was not double lined which was so disappointing
These tops are amazing quality and fit your body so well
Form fitted and very soft. It’s a nice basic you can dress up or down. Definitely getting it in more colors

I love this top! It squeezes you in all the right places and the color is perfect for spring and summer. My favorite thing about this top is that it's double lined as well! The material is a little different than skims but I love it just as much as my skims top! It also goes up high on your neck which I love. I got a small and I'm 5'7 and 135 lbs.

These are I guess a little better quality than you may expect for the price and brand. Not completely buttery soft, but does have a somewhat cooling feeling & is double lined which I feel makes it look a lil better quality. I felt they were what I would expect, honestly, but maybe others would think higher of them. I am 135lbs, 5’7, and 34DD- I have ordered Medium and Large. I have a few different colors. I noticed the Medium seems to stretch a little in the chest/armpit area as if too snug with my chest size whereas the Large (in white) seemed to be less form fitting/looser & less flattering. Out of the two sizes, I think I would choose the Medium again because the Large just seemed to not fit the way it should. The Medium does rise in the belly area though too from being form fitting so I believe it is all preference.

I wasn't expecting such high quality from this shirt! The shirt is double lined, buttery soft, and tailored to snatched the waist! Super easy to dress up or dress down! Worth the buy! Already bought more!
Cute and comfortable double lined  shirt! Would buy this again in another color.

Do not buy if you want the shirt to last more than 3 washes. The fabric of the shirt is not great quality and after 3 washes it is now pilling and the neck is stretched and the shirt does not look good. Definitely not worth the $30 price tag. The only pro is that the white shirt is mostly not see through but definitely still needs a bra. Get a cotton shirt, this is not a worth it skims dupe

I ordered both L and XL in 4 different colors, long sleeve and short sleeve. I’m typically a medium, but I didn’t want it to be like shapewear, so I sized up. Still ungodly tight. LOVE the fabric and the colors, but there was no difference between the L and XL. If you’re looking for a shirt similar to shape wear, this is great. If you want something not crazy tight probably not for you. It rolls up a lot unfortunately bc it is so tight.

Absolutely love this t shirt! I am 5’1, 128 pounds and it snatches the body so good. Great thick quality too
These are good to throw on and go! Fits good and is very soft!

评论概述: Thick, but in a good way
评论详情: I liked that the shirt is double lined, it really smooth you out. However, I did not like the tightness and compression feel from it. I am normally a small or medium in tops and the medium was a bit too tight for me. I had to return it, but thinking about getting a large.
It's a gift for a grandchild for Christmas, so will not be able to rate it until then.
Feel just like skims! Absolutely love how comfortable and breathable they are!
I get so many compliments on this shirt and it is great material. It’s so comfortable and not too tight around the arms.

评论概述: Fabric is amazing and so comfy!!

评论详情: These shirts are VERY inconsistent. I’ve ordered multiple and every single one has came with the stitching coming undone. For the price of these shirts I wouldn’t have expected such cheap quality. They would 100% be worth the price if the stitching wasn’t so bad.

Saw this hyped on Tik Tok and decided to try it. It's a nice shirt and quite thick, but it runs a little small when compared to other brands. If you have thick upper arms (like me), it's pretty constrictive. I think I'll stick with my bodysuits from another brand that I love.

I’ve heard a lot about Skims, but I didn’t want to splurge on one of their shirts, so I decided to try this dupe. I was curious to see if I could get similar quality for a fraction of the price. The shirt fits perfectly! It’s true to size and has a great stretch to it, which makes it feel like it hugs my body in all the right places. It’s not too tight but still gives a smooth, flattering shape. The material is soft and feels high-quality—definitely not cheap or flimsy. It’s smooth to the touch, and while it's not as luxe as the real Skims fabric, it’s pretty close. It holds its shape well after washing, too. The shirt is incredibly comfortable. It’s breathable and stretchy, which makes it perfect for wearing all day. I’ve worn it to work and out running errands, and it never feels too tight or uncomfortable. I’ve washed the shirt several times, and it’s held up really well. It hasn’t shrunk, faded, or lost its shape, which I was worried about since it’s a dupe. I just hang it to dry, and it’s as good as new. Overall, I’m really impressed with this Skims shirt dupe. It offers similar quality and fit for a fraction of the price, and I’ll definitely be buying more. If you’re looking for an affordable alternative to Skims, I highly recommend giving this one a try!
Material was a good thickness. Comfortable. Reccomend sizing up ! Not as see through as most white shirts.
Flattering and pretty color, but had stretches/lines in the fabric. Not worth the price

This top is a good backup top. Good quality but overall not my favorite. The neckline is uncomfortable and awkwardly high in my opinion. Not super flattering but a good just in case I haven't done laundry shirt.

Double lining is great, you don’t have to wear a bra. Smallest size fits a 9 year old thin girl. Good length and fabric quality, no snags after many washes and wears. Great for layering. Never wrinkled. Fitted. Will buy in lots more colors.

if you came here to find a dupe honestly bro just buy the original dont be stingy like me now. but its a shirt! i mean. i can wear it and it looks fine! the collar is beginning to go bacon collar though so big con imo and also those weird stains that come with things in this material are on there (washing it works i think idk i forgot) but other than that. its a shirt that you can totally wear

I love these tops! I ordered 2 colors (and will be ordering more) but the black is significantly smaller than the white one. They’re both smalls.

评论概述: Love this shirt!!!!!!!! Just get it
评论详情: This is not cotton!!!! Let me make that clear, but I wash with my dark in hot/cold water and always AIR DRY. I have accidentally dried a few times and wear it at least once or twice a week when I first got it and hasn't piled up. I'm 5'2 120 pounds and small sucks me in while medium is more comfortable! I love them both for different jeans as the small rides up on me for a more crop look and the medium stays in place more.
I loved it so much I got it in different colors. Quality is great and can wear it anything!

I ordered both a Skims top from Nordstrom (the Jersey style) along with these tops from Amazon in both the off white and lighter gray color and I actually love these tops from Amazon. The material is substantial and thick, contour style so it’s definitely snug, which is what I wanted as I wear them with trouser style or looser pants. The “Pearl” color is definitely not a white, it’s off white more of a cream for sure which I didn’t expect. At first I thought I’d send it back but when I tried it on it does look lovely. Size wise I think it’s true to size. I am 34C- 25 waist and normally a XS/Small and the Small was perfect for me. The waist has a little extra material but if I went smaller the chest would be too tight. It’s definitely meant to be a snug top , but the material is smoothing. I will order the black and ash color as well.

This material was exactly what I was looking for the white is not see-through at all. It’s double lined for a thick material. No need to size down or up, true to size. But if you want it to be more form fitting, don’t size up always go down. I got a size small and i usually wear size small sometimes medium tops. Totally going to be getting another color soon!
Love the material, stretchy and slight compression! But fit is a little small on the shoulder. Double lined and only ever so slightly see thru, so wear nip covers!
